title: Sovereign AI Factories and the Future of Infrastructure Strategy [Promoted Content]
summary_full: As AI becomes a strategic national asset, achieving true AI sovereignty requires control not just over data, but over the full infrastructure stack, such as compute, storage, and open software platforms, in order to avoid vendor dependency and ensure long-term digital independence.
